text: Angbu-ilgu is a concave sundial shaped like a hemisphere and was first made 16 years' rule of King Sejong (1434). That was composed of the hour lines, the seasonal lines, sibanmyeon, Yeoungchim and the horizonal surface. ==Other websites== * 앙부일구 <仰釜日晷> ::: 대교학습백과 ::: * Hemispherical sundial with a central gnomon point Kotsana's Museum Category:Clocks
title: Angbu-ilgu
